12.content:

She spends about 2 to 3 hours shopping. she then decides to take a break and head over to the food court to get something to eat. When she gets there, she sees a boy about her age sitting all by himself. Jenny feels bad that the boy is sitting by himself. She walks over to the boy and says to him
"Hi there, you mind if I sit with you?"
the boy says "If you want to". Jenny introduces herself to the boy
"My name is Jenny. What's yours?"
The boys answered "My name is Adam".
"If you don't mind me asking. How old are you are, Adam?"
" I am 14 yrs old".
"Cool. I am fourteen too".
She then asked Adam "So do you have any girls who are your friends?"
"Not really. Why?" replied Adam
"I was wondering if i could be your friend". replied Jenny
"Are you sure?, I just met you". replied Adam
Jenny responded by saying "Of course I am sure, so do you want to be friends?"
Adam says "Okay, that sounds like fun, Jenny".
He then says "Do you wanna to go someplace else so we can get to know each other a little more?" Jenny says ...................

121.content:
She quickly jumps out of her chair and grabs ur hand, you notice she is dressed very hot. A green top, jeans, and orange tan boots.
You admire her boots while running, and then you remember that you have a serious foot fetish and Your going home with a girl. What will happen, you wonder, after about a half hour of driving you reach her house. She opens the door and tells you that the house will be very quiet because her parents are on holiday. 14.content:
13 year old Kara goes to the park to look for a boy her age to play with her pretty size 6 feet. Being the newbie to the area and just becoming friends with the other girls, Kara doesn't know many people so she's gonna be looking to making friends along with boys to play with her feet. She sees a boy about her age sitting all by himself on a park bench. Kara felt bad that the boy is sitting by himself.
She walks over to the boy and asks the boy "Hi there, mind if I sit with you?"
the boy says "I don't mind. Go right ahead.". Kara sits down next to the boy and introduces herself to him
"My name is Kara. What's yours?"
"My name is Kyle" the boy answered.
" If you don't mind me asking. How old are you, Kyle?"
" I don't mind. I am 13 yrs old".
" Oh cool. I am thirteen too". She then asked Kyle
"So do you have any girls who are your friends?"
"Just a few. Why?"
"I know we just met but I was wondering if I could be your friend?".
"I did just meet you. We should get to know each other a bit more first OK?".
"Sure thing,Kyle. Do wanna stay here and talk? Go to your place? Go to my place? Where should we get to know each other better?"
Kyle thinks about it for a bit and says ...................

info.brief_description: A group of girls who are best friend are looking for guys to play with their feet.
info.description:
4 girls who are best friends are looking for guys their age to play with their feet.

girls feet related additions only.
no sexual content

the names of the 4 girls are:

Ashley,a 15 yr old girl who has size 9 feet and is the oldest girl of the girls.

Jenny, a 14 yr old girl who has size 7 feet and has been b.f.f.'s with Ashley since they were little.

Sarah, a 13 yr old girl who has size 8 feet and is close friends with Ashley and Jenny.

Kara, a 13 yr old girl who has size 6 feet and just became friends with Ashley, Jenny, and Sarah.

have fun with the story
